name: Firestorm (TeamAlacrity)
description:
Firestorm

(Demonic Fire boss by Alex)

Firestorm is a 2.5D Action-Platformer where you axe and extinguish fire demons. Can you escape being consumed by the flame before your oxygen runs out?

Controls

  • Move [a, d]
  • Jump [spacebar]
  • Crouch [s]
  • Attack [left mouse button]
  • Aim [mouse cursor]
  • Switch to Axe [1]
  • Switch to Extinguisher [2]
  • Pause [ESC, p]

Important: If you are experiencing stutters, try enabling hardware acceleration in the browser.

ADDITIONAL INFO
  • This game was created using the Unity Game Engine
  • Additional resources used included: Magicavoxel and Adobe Mixamo
  • The total production from conceptual to final integration was about 3 months
